timeline.bodyText: You probably want to change name of this variable. It is a little confusing now.
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: Yes, I do. I have changed it.
replies.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.message:
Group structure sync - additional attributes

* Implemented loading of additional attributes data returned from the
query.
* Now, from the extsource, it is possible to load additional attribute
data, if the columns have a correct name.
* Loaded data will be set as group def attributes, other attributes
cannot be set right now, although it is possible to load them from the
extSourceSql.

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer to return the new resulting Map instead of just changing the input one.
timeline.author: balcirakpeter

replies.bodyText: I have changed it so it returns the data.
replies.author: Vojtech-Sassmann
